Text: It appears that settings are not generated on opening the game as I previously thought. So if after starting a new game you get 'unable to find settings' error, download the zip at http://cl.ly/2j1t012Q1o08 unzip and copy the two folders to /Users/*Your Username*/Documents/My Games. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Hey ryballs, whenever I try to load my saved game I get one of those "error program needs to close" popups. Any suggestions?
